ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately causes all allies to lose HP equal to <unbreak>15%</unbreak> of their Max HP and increases their ATK by <unbreak>200</unbreak> for the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: Fried rice that is golden brown. Eating it almost feels like some punishment game. Just looking at it fills you with determination. "Of course, we can just casually cook up some fried rice..."
